__e: Lady, you're just a spoke on a wheel, tryin' to make a livin' like the rest of us schmucks.
Now, it's no skin off my nose how you make a living.
Making a living is about all I got time for now.
From there's we'll find a way to the Tree of Life.
They don't believe in the Tree of Life anymore. Here. Wear this.
You got a right to the Tree of Life
I have to drink the Water of Life.
He's taken the Water of Life.
That's why they want me killed. They're afraid I'll take the Water of Life.
Tomorrow and tomorrow and tomorrow creeps in this petty pace from day to day to the last syllable of recorded time.
You can't close the book on life where and when you please.
You can read the book of life.
That is one of life's great questions.
In this big game that we play, life... it's not what you hope for or deserve... it's what you take.

Now, pay attention, 'cause I'm about to tell you the secret to life.
The secret of life? Knowing when to leave.
